output: html_document

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
```

## Load Data

```{r}
xy_locations <- read_csv("data/mockaroo_latlon.csv")
```

### Plot XY on the Map

```{r makemap}
leaflet(width = "100%") %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(data = xy_locations, lat = ~Latitude, lng = ~ Longitude, popup = xy_locations$Company)
```
